articles.author: Raf Casert
articles.title: Despite a slow start, Europe overtakes the US for vaccinations - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Europe is declaring its steady immunisation strategy a success as public confidence and incentives push a surge in vaccine numbers.
articles.content:
While the US and Britain issued emergency authorisations of vaccines to get shots into arms quickly, the EU went through the longer process of granting full approvals, putting it weeks behind.
